packageMeta.name: purescript-screeps-classy
packageMeta.description: Screeps.com binding - can program your Screeps AI with PureScript classes!

declarations.comments: For time-dependent functions where the output changes depending on when it is called.
declarations.title: TIME

declarations.comments: Global scope is cleared periodically, so values depending on global variables like Game and Memory need to be fetched dynamically. This effect enforces this.
declarations.title: TICK

declarations.comments: Memory accesses are tagged with this effect.
declarations.title: MEMORY

declarations.comments: Tag for functions which execute a Screeps command as a side effect e.g. to move a creep.
declarations.title: CMD

modules.name: Screeps
modules.comments:
This helper module re-exports almost all of the types and constants used in the library.
Functions for using particular types are defined in their own modules.

declarations.comments: Memory accesses are tagged with this effect.

declarations.comments: Global scope is cleared periodically, so values depending on global variables like Game and Memory need to be fetched dynamically. This effect enforces this.
declarations.title: TICK

modules.name: Screeps.Memory
modules.comments: Corresponds to the Screeps APIs [Memory](http://support.screeps.com/hc/en-us/articles/203084991-API-Reference) and [RawMemory](http://support.screeps.com/hc/en-us/articles/205619121-RawMemory)

declarations.comments: RoomName allows to enumerate rooms even if they are not active.
declarations.title: RoomName

declarations.comments: CreepName allows to enumerate creeps that are yet dead
declarations.title: CreepName

modules.name: Screeps.Path
modules.comments:
This module implements PathFinder API.

WARNING: While PathFinder accepts any number of target objects,
         excessive GC may occur if there are too many.
         API author advises to sort targets by uniform distance [Screeps.Coord],
         and use only first 10 or so.

declarations.comments: Indicates an unwalkable tile.
declarations.title: unwalkable

declarations.comments: Empty callback - just use default terrain cost.
declarations.title: allDefaultCosts

declarations.comments: Set a given coordinate to any cost.
declarations.title: set

declarations.comments:
Get current cost of any coordinate.
Zero indicates default terrain cost.
declarations.title: get

declarations.comments: Clone cost matrix.
declarations.title: clone

declarations.comments: Serialized cost matrix, suitable for `JSON.stringify`.
declarations.title: SerializedCostMatrix

declarations.comments: Serialize cost matrix for storage in `Memory`.
declarations.title: serialize

modules.name: Screeps.Path.Cache
modules.comments: This module facilitates caching of the PathFinder's `RoomCallback`.
